section B出得circle就一定要你用埋tangent properties

replies.msg:
Let f(x) = (x-1)(x-3)(ax+b)+53x-33

f(2)=54
2a+b=19

f(-4)=0
-4a+b=7

a=2 and b=15

Therefore f(x)=(x-1)(x-3)(2x+15)+53x-33=(x+4)(2x^2-x+3)
The required quotient is 2x^2-x+3

replies.msg:
講少少課外嘢

設P為命題「a大於3」以及Q為命題「a等於3」

II可以轉化做「若P，則P或Q」
即係等價於(equivalent to)「非P或(P或Q)」
亦即係等價於「(非P或P)或Q」

由於「非P或P」係恆真句(tautology)，意思係必然正確咁解，故此「(非P或P)或Q」都必然正確

所以II係啱

2)2x^2+kx+2=0 has distinct real roots => k^2-4(2)(2)>0
=> k^2>16 => k<-4 or k>4 => k is a real number which is either
smaller than -4 or larger than 4.
條題目唔係問你range喎

case 2:
2x^2+kx+2=0 has the root x=-3/2.
2(-3/2)^2-3/2k+2=0
k=13/3 which satisfies k>4.
This value of k is correct.

Let f(x) be a polynomial with real coefficients. When f(x) is divided by 2x^2+kx+1, the quotient is 2x+3 and the remainder is ax+b. It is given that f(-3/2)=0 and f(0)=6.
(a) Find the values of a and b
(b) Find the value(s) of k if the equation f(x)=0 has exactly two distinct real roots.

replies.msg:
Let -3/2 and b be the two distinct roots of f(x) = 0

If -3/2 is the repeated root,
then f'(-3/2) = f(-3/2) = 0
k = 13/3

If b is the repeated root,
k= 4 or -4
